body_html: Oke, I just recompiled OpenCV 3.1 without CUDA support (i.e. WITH_CUDA=OFF) and this solved the problem. TensorFlow initialization with and without import cv2 is now fast. So it seems like there is an incompatibility with TensorFlow and OpenCV compiled with CUDA. Like you said, probably both TF and OpenCV are initializing GPU memory at the same time which causes trouble?
